final_answer.precision_note: Input values have 3 significant figures. Answer given to 3 significant figures.

method: Calculate concentrations using c = n/V. [NO2] = 0.180 mol / 2.00 dm3 = 0.0900 mol dm-3. [N2O4] = 0.220 mol / 2.00 dm3 = 0.110 mol dm-3. Use the Kc expression from L20: Kc = [NO2]^2 / [N2O4]. Kc = (0.0900)^2 / 0.110 = 0.00810 / 0.110 = 0.0736.
checks: Concentrations calculated before substituting into Kc.
Kc is reported as dimensionless as requested.
